snippet: Jason Stevens, who abruptly closed the Brooklyn restaurant and event space, was charged with tax fraud and grand larceny.
abstract: Jason Stevens, owner of restaurant and event space reBar in Dumbo, Brooklyn, is arrested and charged with tax fraud and grand larceny; Stevens failed to pay more than $1 million in taxes; closing of restaurant leaves some 200 couples, who had planned weddings at reBar, in the lurch.
lead_paragraph: Jason Stevens, who abruptly closed the Brooklyn restaurant and event space, was charged with tax fraud and grand larceny.

headline.main: ReBar Owner’s Arrest Is No Help for Ruined Wedding Plans
headline.print_headline: Arrest Is No Help for Ruined Wedding Plans
